content:
## Feature Improvements

- Added update log display for all versions
- Refactored ruby character switch interface for Japanese and Traditional Chinese Taiwan versions

## Major Updates

- Added Game ID and SNS account display functionality
- Refactored Chinese versions: Merged Malaysia and Singapore versions for unified management
- Added AI-powered multilingual translation support for Mainland China version

## Feature Improvements

- Added ruby character (Zhuyin) support for Traditional Chinese Taiwan version
- Added user feedback interface across all versions

## Feature Enhancements

- Added ruby character (Furigana) support for Japanese version
- Added background image author attribution across all versions

## Visual Upgrade

- Refactored interface style to Liquid Glass design

## Text Optimization

- Unified terminology from "Huayu" to "Huawen" across all Chinese variants

## Feature Expansion

- Added new language selection menu
- Added support for Simplified Chinese (Mainland China region)
- Added single-file distribution support

## Multilingual Support

- Added multilingual support: English, Chinese (Malaysia), Chinese (Singapore), Traditional Chinese (Taiwan)

## New Features

- Added birthday reminder functionality

## Architecture Refactoring

- Refactored project structure using modular design

## Experience Optimization

- Optimized first-screen content display
- Improved page loading speed
- Enhanced responsive layout adaptation
- Improved privacy policy page display

## Feature Updates

- Integrated Google Analytics 4 for basic data collection
- Upgraded interface style to glass morphism effect

## Initial Release

- Initial version launched with Japanese interface support
